summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, regarding Bureau of Prisons (BOP) staff on AWOL (Absent Without Leave) status for the week of August 4-10, 2019. It lists 11 staff members with various reasons for absence and mentions an attached augmentation agreement.

persons.name: Jim
persons.context: The sender of the original email listing the AWOL staff, likely a supervisor or HR official within the Bureau of Prisons.

events.title: Staff AWOL Status Week
events.description: Eleven Bureau of Prisons staff members were reported as Absent Without Leave (AWOL) for a total of 40 hours during this week.

keyFacts: The document is an internal BOP email dated August 14, 2019, discussing staff attendance.
Eleven staff members were on AWOL status for the week of August 4-10, 2019.
Reasons for absence include OWCP (Office of Workers' Compensation Programs) cases ending, surgery, military orders expiring, and a probationary officer's motorcycle accident.
An augmentation agreement is mentioned as being attached, with no agreement concerning overtime sign-up procedures.
The document appears to be routine administrative correspondence and does not directly reference Jeffrey Epstein, his case, or related individuals.
